release.action: Add support for Allure reporting.
Removed ExtentReports.
Removed GaleniumAssertion.
Renamed all Java packages by changing 'galenium' to 'glnm'.
Bumped versions for dependencies and plugins.
Some cleaning up in archetype.
New dedicated base class for tests that does not assume browser interaction. Original base class renamed.
New base class for tests that does not assume browser interaction.
JCR query sampler to be used in dataprovider or verification.
Example of AEM specific test using content path provider based on JCR query.
Example of page HTML source comparison.
Added special "no browser" device.
Handling for multi-line samples.
Image comparison can now handle 'crop-if-outside' Galen parameter.
TestNG dataprovider convenience methods for providing from file or sampler.
JSoup and HTML Cleaner functionality around sampling HTML and cookies.
Switch to github maintained java-diff-utils.
Diff based verification for multi-line comparisons.
Replace BrowserMob Proxy with actively maintained fork BrowserUp Proxy.
Only include Selenium drivers for Chrome, FF and IE as dependencies.
Added Webdriver download from Java code.
Removed Webdriver download via Maven plugin.
Split Difference implementations into packages.
Add start scripts to archetype.
Version and other properties in archetype now filtered correctly.
New versions for parents and dependencies.
Parameters to pass HTTPS proxy to webdriver.
Generated expected keys are sorted. Text comparison is in four-digit display to make it better sortable.
Code generation now also generates GaleniumWebElements.
Maven archetype for generating spec and test project.
Documentation.
Maven site generation.
Newest webdriver for Firefox and Chrome.
New versions for parents and dependencies.
Convenience methods to wait for visibility and text.
Use JSONFlattener instead of GSon to get grid host.
Now using Selenium 3.14.0.
Fix some warnings.
Screenshots on success are now default for integrated projects.
NPE in isVerified under certain conditions.
Now using Maven Plugin API 3.5.4.
Now using Selenium 3.13.0.
Name sanitization and shortening using MD5 infixes.
Better logging configuration.
Integration modules to use as parents for test projects.
Clean up POMs.
A lot of name changes.
JSON verification.
Use BrowserMob for Har sampling, stability, and sanity.
Test names are now based on Differences.
Stability is now a verification.
Only download drivers for browsers used in test run.
Media query support in device data providers.
CSV based device configuration.
Moved caching from Verifications to Samplers.
Sampler based Verifications.
Default thread count for tests is now CPU count.
Includes/excludes for Galen specs used in code generation.
Maven module structure.
Support for headless Firefox.
New webdriver configuration.
Update example to use code generation with new Maven plugin.
Media query concept with data provider support.
Update dependencies.
Verifiable stability concept to wait for changes to the page like animations, page loading, or rendering.
Sampler concept.
Dedicated core and convenience submodules formed by splitting up galenium.
Retry analyzer integration now automatically, if retryMax is greater than zero.
Break up InteractionUtil into more specialized classes.
Added BrowserMob Proxy for basic authentication.
Add Maven plugin for generating Java Selectors from Galen specifications.
Add configuration options for SSL certificate handling.
Switch WebDriver creation from DesiredCapabilities to Options.
Updated webdrivers to newest versions.
Dependencies updated to newest versions.
Maven plugin to generate Selectors from Galen specs.
Added cookie fetching capabilities.
Now deleting Selenium's screenshots to avoid disk space problems on systems not cleaning their temp directory.
Removed PhantomJS.
Added configuration option for browser log level.
Updated chromedriver and geckodriver versions.
Javadoc and code clean up.
Bump Galen version to 2.3.5 and Selenium to 3.5.3.
Bugfixes.
Added text sampling.
Improved image sampling.
Added AemUtil for AEM specific helper methods.
Upgrade to TestNG 6.11.
Upgrade to Galen 2.3.3 with Selenium 3.
Firefox as browser in example project.
Configurable lazy loading for webdriver.
Headless Chrome.
Factory methods for relative selector construction.
Refactored WebDriver management and creation.
Headless tests with Chrome/Chromium.
Screenshots on success optional. Default false.
More verbose logging around web driver handling.
String based driver management to integrate Galen JS tests.
Configurable retries for driver instantiation.
Add HTTP BasicAuth credentials to base URL.
Context now holding all objects previously in WebDriverManager.
Category handling to report utility.
Fix for chromedriver_mac. Set version to 64bit.
More methods in InteractionUtil and driver from context used.
New concept of using verification objects.
Marked logger to have finer control in reporting.
Context object to hold thread specific objects.
New listener structure.
NPE in ExtentAppender.
Initial release.
